name: Writing the Self: Global Women's Autobiographies
description: An exploration of the ways in which women from different countries construct the gendered subject in their representations of childhood, sexuality, work, maternity and illness. Texts will be read in English and an emphasis will be place on the cultural contexts of gender, ethnicity and class.
prerequisites: ENGB50H3 or [WSTA01H3 and [WSTA03H3 or (WSTA02H3)] and any ENG or FRE literature course]].
